parameters.name: Resource
parameters.label: Workspace
parameters.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "node_"
| distinct _ResourceId

parameters.name: Computer
parameters.label: Hostname
parameters.query:
InsightsMetrics
| summarize by Computer
| sort by Computer asc

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Name startswith "node_"
| summarize dcount(Computer)
content.title: Servers Connected

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_cpu_seconds_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName), Cpu = Tags.cpu, Mode = Tags.mode
| where Mode == "idle"
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(Mode, "/", Cpu, "/", HostName, "/", _ResourceId)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)), PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
//| where isnotnull(Rate)
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Rate, HostName
| summarize CpuUsage = 100 - (100 * avg(Rate))
content.title: CPU Used

content.query:
let servercnt =
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_cpu_seconds_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName)
| summarize dcount(tostring(HostName));
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_filesystem_size_bytes'
| summarize disk_per_server=avg(Val)
| extend Disk_capacity = disk_per_server * toscalar(servercnt)
content.title: Disk Capacity

content.query:
let diskfree = InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_filesystem_avail_bytes'
| summarize diskfree=avg(Val);
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_filesystem_size_bytes'
| summarize disktotal=avg(Val)
| extend usedmem = 100 - (100 * (toscalar(diskfree) / disktotal ))
content.title: Disk Used

content.query:
let servercnt =
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_memory_MemTotal_bytes'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName)
| summarize dcount(tostring(HostName));
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_memory_MemTotal_bytes'
| summarize mem_per_server = avg(Val)
| extend Memory_capacity = mem_per_server * toscalar(servercnt)
content.title: Memory Capacity

content.query:
let memfree = InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_memory_MemFree_bytes'
| summarize memfree=avg(Val);
let memcache = InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_memory_Cached_bytes'
| summarize memcache=avg(Val);
let membuffer = InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_memory_Buffers_bytes'
| summarize membuffer=avg(Val);
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_memory_MemTotal_bytes'
| summarize memtotal=avg(Val)
| extend usedmem = 100 * (1-((toscalar(memfree) + toscalar(memcache) + toscalar(membuffer))/memtotal))
content.title: Memory Used

content.query:
let totalcount =  Heartbeat
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| summarize dcount(Computer);
 Heartbeat
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| where LastHeartbeat < ago(1h)
| summarize inactive=count()
| project value=iff(inactive==0, strcat("All ", toscalar(totalcount) , " nodes are active") , strcat(tostring(inactive)," out of ", tostring(toscalar(totalcount)), " are inactive" ))
//| project value=strcat("3 out of 3 nodes are active")
content.title: Inactive Agents (missing heartbeats)

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_cpu_seconds_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName), Cpu = Tags.cpu, Mode = Tags.mode
| where Mode == "idle"
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(Mode, "/", Cpu, "/", HostName, "/", _ResourceId)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)), PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
//| where isnotnull(Rate)
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Rate, HostName
| summarize CpuUsage = 100 - (100 * avg(Rate)) by HostName
content.title: Heatmap for the CPU Process time of the nodes

content.query:
let diskfree = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_filesystem_avail_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| summarize Disk_Free=avg(Val) by hostname;
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_filesystem_size_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| summarize Disk_Total = avg(Val) by hostname
| join diskfree on hostname
| extend Disk_Used = 100 - (100 * (Disk_Free / Disk_Total ))
content.title: Heatmap for the Disk usage of the nodes

content.query:
let memfree = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_memory_MemFree_bytes'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName)
| summarize memfree=avg(Val) by HostName;
let memcache = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_memory_Cached_bytes'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName)
| summarize memcache=avg(Val) by HostName
| join (memfree) on HostName;
let membuffer = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_memory_Buffers_bytes'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName)
| summarize membuffer=avg(Val) by HostName
| join (memcache) on HostName;
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_memory_MemTotal_bytes'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName)
| summarize memtotal=avg(Val) by HostName
| join (membuffer) on HostName
| project HostName, memfree, memcache, membuffer, memtotal
| extend usedmem = 100*(1 - ((memfree + memcache + membuffer)/memtotal))
//| extend usedmem = 100 * (1-((toscalar(memfree) + toscalar(memcache) + toscalar(membuffer))/memtotal))
content.title: Heatmap for the Memory usage of the nodes

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "node_"
| summarize by Name
| extend Category=case( Name contains "cpu", "CPU",  
                        Name contains "memory", "Memory",

content.title: List the collected performance counters

content.query:
let times = toscalar(
    Heartbeat
    | summarize pack_array(min(TimeGenerated), max(TimeGenerated))
)
;
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime(times[0])
| where TimeGenerated < todatetime(times[1])
| summarize heartbeat_per_hour=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), Computer
| extend available_per_hour=iff(heartbeat_per_hour>0, true, false)
| summarize total_available_hours_calculated=countif(available_per_hour==true) by Computer 
| extend duration = datetime_diff('hour',todatetime(times[1]),todatetime(times[0]))
| extend total_available_hours=iff(total_available_hours_calculated>duration,duration,total_available_hours_calculated)
| extend availability_rate= (total_available_hours*100)/duration
content.title: Availability rate

content.query:
let usedDiskUnhealthyThreshold = 90;
let usedDiskCriticalThreshold = 99;
let diskfree = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_filesystem_avail_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName), device = tostring(Json.device)
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(hostname, "/", device)
| where hostname in ({Computer})
| summarize Disk_Free=max(Val) by NodeDisk;
let data = materialize(InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_filesystem_size_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName), device = tostring(Json.device)
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(hostname, "/", device)
| where hostname in ({Computer})
| summarize Disk_Total = max(Val) by  NodeDisk
| join diskfree on  NodeDisk
//| extend Disk_Used = 100 - (100 * (Disk_Free / Disk_Total ))
| extend Disk_Used = ((Disk_Total - Disk_Free) / Disk_Total) * 100
| extend State = iff(Disk_Used >= usedDiskCriticalThreshold, 'Critical FileSystems', iif((Disk_Used >= usedDiskUnhealthyThreshold and Disk_Used < usedDiskCriticalThreshold), 'Unhealthy FileSystems', 'Healthy FileSystems'))
);
data
| summarize Count = count(), Disks = makeset(NodeDisk) by State
| union (
    data
    | summarize Count = count(), Disks = dynamic(["*"])
    | extend State = 'All FileSystems'
)
| join kind = fullouter (datatable (State: string) ['All FileSystems', 'Critical FileSystems', 'Unhealthy FileSystems', 'Healthy FileSystems']) on State
| extend Count = iff(State == '', 0, Count), Disks = iff(State == '', dynamic([]), Disks)
| order by Count desc

let usedFileSystemUnhealthyThreshold = 90;
let usedFileSystemCriticalThreshold = 99;
let FileSystemfree = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_filesystem_avail_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName), device = tostring(Json.device)
| where hostname in ({Computer})
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(hostname, "/", device)
| summarize FileSystem_Free=max(Val) by hostname,device;
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_filesystem_size_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName), device = tostring(Json.device)
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(hostname, "/", device)
| where hostname in ({Computer})
| summarize FileSystem_Total = max(Val) by  hostname,device
| join FileSystemfree on  hostname,device
| extend FileSystem_Used = (FileSystem_Total - FileSystem_Free)
| project-away hostname1, device1
| extend  hostname = strcat('ðŸ–¥ï¸ ',  hostname)
| extend FileSystem_Used_pct = (FileSystem_Used / FileSystem_Total ) * 100
| extend State = iff(FileSystem_Used_pct >= usedFileSystemCriticalThreshold, 'Critical FileSystems', iif((FileSystem_Used_pct >= usedFileSystemUnhealthyThreshold and FileSystem_Used_pct < usedFileSystemCriticalThreshold), 'Unhealthy FileSystems', 'Healthy FileSystems'))
| order by hostname asc

InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_network_receive_bytes_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Tags.hostName), device = Tags.device
| where hostname in ({Computer})
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(device, "/", hostname)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)), PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Rate, hostname, device
| summarize RX_bytes = avg(Rate) by TimeGenerated, tostring(hostname), tostring(device)
| order by RX_bytes desc
| limit 5
content.title: Top 5 devices receiving bytes

content.query:
Perf 
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" and CounterName contains "cpuUsage"
| summarize Avg_CPU_Usage=bin(avg(CounterValue),0.01) / 1000000000 by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| where Avg_CPU_Usage > 2
| summarize Alert_Count = count() by Computer
content.title: Alert count for each host collected over 30 min interval

| summarize Avg_CPU_Usage=bin(avg(CounterValue),0.01) / 1000000000 by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| order by Avg_CPU_Usage desc
| limit 10
content.title: Top 10 Avg CPU Usage collected over 30 min interval

content.query:
Perf 
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" and CounterName contains "cpuUsage"
| summarize Avg_CPU_Usage=bin(avg(CounterValue),0.01) / 1000000000 by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
content.title: Av CPU Usage for every host over time

content.query:
let CPU_Usage =
Perf
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" and CounterName contains "cpuusage"
| summarize CPU_Usage = round((avg(CounterValue) / 1000000000),3)  by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), CounterName
| order by todatetime(TimeGenerated) desc;
let CPU_Capacity =
Perf
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" and CounterName contains "cpuCapacity"
| summarize CPU_Capacity = round((avg(CounterValue) / 1000000000),3)  by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), CounterName
| order by todatetime(TimeGenerated) desc;
let CPU_Allocatable =
Perf
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" and CounterName contains "cpuAllocatable"
| summarize CPU_Allocatable = round((avg(CounterValue) / 1000000000),3)  by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), CounterName
| order by todatetime(TimeGenerated) desc;
let CPU_Usage_Capacity = CPU_Usage
| join CPU_Capacity on Computer, TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, CPU_Capacity, CPU_Usage
| order by todatetime(TimeGenerated) desc;
CPU_Allocatable
| join CPU_Usage_Capacity on Computer, TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, CPU_Capacity, CPU_Allocatable, CPU_Usage
| order by todatetime(TimeGenerated) desc
| extend cpupercentused = round((CPU_Usage / CPU_Capacity )*100, 2)
| extend cpupercentfree = round(100 - cpupercentused, 2)
| extend Notification = case(cpupercentused <= 50, "OK", cpupercentused <= 80, "Warning", "Critical")
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, Computer, CPU_Capacity, CPU_Allocatable, CPU_Usage
content.title: CPU usage agregated over 30 mins

content.query:
Perf
| make-series Trend = avg(CounterValue) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from ago(7d) to now() step 1h by Computer
| project-away TimeGenerated
| join kind = inner (Perf
    | summarize Avg_CPU_Usage=avg(CounterValue) by Computer
    ) on Computer
| project Computer, Avg_CPU_Usage_cores = round((Avg_CPU_Usage / 1000000000),2), Trend
| order by Avg_CPU_Usage_cores desc
content.title: Avg CPU Usage trend

content.query:
Perf
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, CounterValue
| summarize CpuUsage=avg(CounterValue), ActualCpuUsage=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Computer
| summarize Timestamp=make_list(TimeGenerated), CpuUsage=make_list(CpuUsage) by Computer
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(CpuUsage)
| mv-expand Timestamp, CpuUsage, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_score, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_baseline
| project-away series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_score
| project-rename ExpectedCpuUsage=series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_baseline
| extend Gap = todecimal(CpuUsage)-todecimal(ExpectedCpuUsage)
| where Gap != 0
| extend Trend=iff(Gap>0, "Up", "Down")
| extend ActualVsExpectedAsPercent = round(todecimal(CpuUsage)*100/todecimal(ExpectedCpuUsage), 3)
//| where ActualVsExpectedAsPercent > 150 or ActualVsExpectedAsPercent < 95
| sort by todatetime(Timestamp) asc
| extend Avg_CPU_Usage = round(todecimal(CpuUsage) / 1000000000,3), Expected_Avg_CPU_Usage = round(todecimal(ExpectedCpuUsage) / 1000000000,3)
//| extend cputype = gettype(Avg_CPU_Usage)
| project Computer, Timestamp=format_datetime(todatetime(Timestamp), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), Trend, Avg_CPU_Usage, Expected_Avg_CPU_Usage, ActualVsExpectedAsPercent
content.title: Daily Cpu Usage Trend analysis

content.query:
Perf
| where Computer in ({Computer})
//| where TimeGenerated >= ago(7d)
| where CounterName contains "cpuUsage"
| summarize CpuUsage=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| summarize Timestamp=make_list(TimeGenerated), CpuUsage=make_list(CpuUsage) by Computer
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(CpuUsage, 1.5, -1, 'linefit')
| mv-expand Timestamp, CpuUsage, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_score, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_baseline
| project-away series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_score
| project-rename ExpectedCpuUsage=series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_baseline
| project-rename anomalies=series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_flag
| project Timestamp, toint(CpuUsage), toint(ExpectedCpuUsage), toint(anomalies)
| render anomalychart with(anomalycolumns=anomalies)
content.title: CPU Usage Actual vs Expected behaviour

content.query:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(7d)
| where CounterName contains "cpuUsage"
| summarize CpuUsage=avg(CounterValue) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated,30m)
| order by TimeGenerated
| summarize CpuUsage=make_list(CpuUsage),TimeGenerated=make_list(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(CpuUsage)
| mv-expand TimeGenerated, CpuUsage, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_baseline
| where series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_flag == 1
| project todatetime(TimeGenerated), Computer, Actual_CPU_Usage = round(todecimal(CpuUsage) / 1000000000, 3), Outlier_CPU_Usage = round(todecimal(series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_baseline) / 1000000000, 3)
//| project-rename Predicted_CpuUsage = todecimal(series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_baseline)
content.title: Anomaly (Outlier) CPU Usage detected over last 7 days

content.query:
let dt = 30m;
let horizon=3d;
Perf
| where CounterName contains "cpuUsage"
| make-series CpuUsage=avg(CounterValue) on TimeGenerated from ago(21d) to now()+horizon step dt by 10m
| extend Predicted_CpuUSage = series_decompose_forecast(CpuUsage, toint(horizon/dt))
| render timechart
content.title: CPU Usage Forecastig

content.query:

                        Name contains "memory", "Memory",
                        Name contains "filesystem", "File System",

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_network_receive_bytes_total'
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Val, Tags
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| extend device = tostring(Json.device)
| summarize rcv_bytes=sum(Val) by device
| order by rcv_bytes desc
| limit 5

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_cpu_seconds_total'
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Val, Tags
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| extend mode = tostring(Json.mode)
| extend cpu = tostring(Json.cpu)
| where hostname in ({Computer})
| sort by hostname, mode, cpu asc, TimeGenerated asc
| extend PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(hostname) != hostname or prev(cpu) != cpu, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| extend PrevVal = prev(Val)
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend DeltaTime = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend cpu_irate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / DeltaTime, (Val - PrevVal) / DeltaTime)
| project TimeGenerated, hostname, mode, cpu, Computer, cpu_irate
| summarize  cpu_irate = avg(cpu_irate) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m), hostname
content.title: Busy System

content.title: Memory Total

content.query:
let mem_cache = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_memory_Cached_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| where hostname in ({Computer})
| summarize mem_cache = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated,15m), hostname;
let cachebuffer = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_memory_Buffers_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| where hostname in ({Computer})
| summarize mem_buffer = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated,15m), hostname
| join mem_cache on TimeGenerated, hostname
| extend cachebuffer = (mem_buffer + mem_cache); 
let mem_free = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_memory_MemFree_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| where hostname in ({Computer})
| summarize mem_free = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated,15m), hostname;
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_memory_MemTotal_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| summarize mem_total = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated,15m), hostname
| join (mem_free 
| join cachebuffer on TimeGenerated, hostname) on TimeGenerated, hostname
| project TimeGenerated, hostname, mem_total, mem_free, cachebuffer
| extend ram_used = (mem_total - mem_free) - cachebuffer;
content.title: Memory Used

content.query:
let maxtime = 
    InsightsMetrics
    | where Computer in ({Computer})
    | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_network_up'
    | extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
    | extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
    | extend device = tostring(Json.device)
    | where hostname in ({Computer})
    | summarize TimeGenerated = max(TimeGenerated) by hostname, device
    | order by TimeGenerated desc;
let status = 
    InsightsMetrics
    | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_network_up'
    | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Val, Tags
    | extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
    | extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
    | where hostname in ({Computer})
    | extend device = tostring(Json.device)
    | summarize status=avg(Val) by TimeGenerated, hostname, device
    | join maxtime on hostname, device, TimeGenerated
    | project-away hostname1, device1, TimeGenerated1;
let join1 = 
    InsightsMetrics
    | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_network_receive_packets_total'
    | extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
    | extend hostname = tostring(Tags.hostName), device = Tags.device
    | where hostname in ({Computer})
    | extend NodeDisk = strcat(device, "/", hostname)
    | order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
    | serialize
    | extend
        PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)),
        PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
    | where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
    | extend Value = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val, iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal)))
    | project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Value, hostname, device
    | summarize RX_packets = avg(Value) by TimeGenerated, tostring(hostname), tostring(device)
    | order by RX_packets desc
    | join status on TimeGenerated, device, hostname
    | project-away device1, hostname1, TimeGenerated1;
let join2 = 
    InsightsMetrics
    | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_network_transmit_packets_total'
    | extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
    | extend hostname = tostring(Tags.hostName), device = Tags.device
    | where hostname in ({Computer})
    | extend NodeDisk = strcat(device, "/", hostname)
    | order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
    | serialize
    | extend
        PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)),
        PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
    | where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
    | extend Value = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val , iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal)))
    | project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Value, hostname, device
    | summarize TX_packets = avg(Value) by TimeGenerated, tostring(hostname), tostring(device)
    | order by TX_packets desc
    | join join1 on TimeGenerated, device, hostname
    | project-away device1, hostname1, TimeGenerated1;
let join3 = 
    InsightsMetrics
    | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_network_receive_errs_total'
    | extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
    | extend hostname = tostring(Tags.hostName), device = Tags.device
    | where hostname in ({Computer})
    | extend NodeDisk = strcat(device, "/", hostname)
    | order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
    | serialize
    | extend
        PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)),
        PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
    | where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
    | extend Value = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val, iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal)))
    | project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Value, hostname, device
    | summarize RX_err_packets = avg(Value) by TimeGenerated, tostring(hostname), tostring(device)
    | join join2 on TimeGenerated, device, hostname
    | project-away device1, hostname1, TimeGenerated1;
//let join4 = 
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_network_transmit_errs_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Tags.hostName), device = Tags.device
| where hostname in ({Computer})
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(device, "/", hostname)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend
    PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)),
    PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend Value = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val , iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal)))
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Value, hostname, device
| summarize TX_err_packets = avg(Value) by TimeGenerated, tostring(hostname), tostring(device)
| join join3 on TimeGenerated, device, hostname
| project-away device1, hostname1, TimeGenerated1
| join (InsightsMetrics
    | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_network_mtu_bytes'
    | extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
    | extend hostname = tostring(Tags.hostName), device = Tags.device
    | where hostname in ({Computer})
    | extend NodeDisk = strcat(device, "/", hostname)
    | order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
    | summarize MTU_bytes = avg(Val) by TimeGenerated, hostname, tostring(device)
    )
    on TimeGenerated, device, hostname
| join kind=leftouter (InsightsMetrics
    | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_hwmon_temp_celsius'
    | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Val, Tags
    | extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
    | extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
    | where hostname in ({Computer})
    | summarize temp=avg(Val) by TimeGenerated, hostname
    )
    on hostname, TimeGenerated
| project-away TimeGenerated1, TimeGenerated2, device1
| extend temp=round(temp,2)
| extend status=iff(status==1, "Up", "Down") 
| extend  hostname = strcat('ðŸ–¥ï¸ ',  hostname)
| project-away hostname1, hostname2
content.title: Network Packets Transferred (with last reported timestamp)

| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Rate, hostname, device
| summarize rcv_bytes = avg(Rate) by bin(TimeGenerated,10m), tostring(hostname), tostring(device)
content.title: Errored Packets transmitted per node over time

content.query:

| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| summarize TT=avg(Val) by hostname

content.query:
let diskfree = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_filesystem_avail_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| summarize Disk_Free=avg(Val) by hostname;
let disk_capacity = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_filesystem_size_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| summarize Disk_Total = avg(Val) by hostname
| join diskfree on hostname
| extend Disk_Used = (Disk_Total - Disk_Free );
let memfree = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_memory_MemFree_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| summarize Mem_Free=avg(Val) by hostname;
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_memory_MemTotal_bytes'
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| summarize Mem_Total=avg(Val) by hostname
| join memfree on hostname
| extend Mem_Used =  (Mem_Total-Mem_Free)
| join disk_capacity on hostname
| project-away hostname1, hostname2, hostname11
| extend Disk_Allocation = strcat(round((Disk_Used/Disk_Total)*100,2), " %"), Memory_Allocation = strcat(round((Mem_Used/Mem_Total)*100,2), " %")
| extend hostname = strcat('ðŸ–¥ï¸ ', hostname)
| project-reorder hostname, Disk_Total, Disk_Used, Disk_Free, Disk_Allocation, Mem_Total, Mem_Used, Mem_Free, Memory_Allocation
content.title: Memory & Disk Capacity & Usage

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_cpu_seconds_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName), Cpu = Tags.cpu, Mode = Tags.mode
| where Mode == "idle"
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(Mode, "/", Cpu, "/", HostName)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)), PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Rate, HostName
| summarize CpuUsage = 100 - (100 * avg(Rate)) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), HostName
| summarize Timestamp=make_list(TimeGenerated), CpuUsage=make_list(CpuUsage) by HostName
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(CpuUsage)
| mv-expand Timestamp, CpuUsage, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_score, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_baseline
| project-away series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_score
| project-rename ExpectedCpuUsage=series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_baseline
| extend Gap = todecimal(CpuUsage)-todecimal(ExpectedCpuUsage)
| where Gap != 0
| extend Trend=iff(Gap>0, "Up", "Down")
| extend ActualVsExpectedAsPercent = round(todecimal(CpuUsage)*100/todecimal(ExpectedCpuUsage), 3)
| sort by todatetime(Timestamp) asc
| extend Avg_CPU_Usage = round(todecimal(CpuUsage),3), Expected_Avg_CPU_Usage = round(todecimal(ExpectedCpuUsage),3)
| extend  HostName = strcat('ðŸ–¥ï¸ ',  HostName)
| project HostName, Timestamp=format_datetime(todatetime(Timestamp), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), Trend, Avg_CPU_Usage, Expected_Avg_CPU_Usage, ActualVsExpectedAsPercent
content.title: Daily CPU Usage Trend Analysis(past 7 days)

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_cpu_seconds_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName), Cpu = Tags.cpu, Mode = Tags.mode
| where Mode == "idle"
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(Mode, "/", Cpu, "/", HostName)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)), PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Rate, HostName
| summarize CpuUsage = 100 - (100 * avg(Rate)) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), HostName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| summarize Timestamp=make_list(TimeGenerated), CpuUsage=make_list(CpuUsage) by HostName
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(CpuUsage, 1.5, -1, 'linefit')
| mv-expand Timestamp, CpuUsage, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_score, series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_baseline
| project-away series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_score
| project-rename ExpectedCpuUsage=series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_baseline
| project-rename anomalies=series_decompose_anomalies_CpuUsage_ad_flag
| project Timestamp, toint(CpuUsage), toint(ExpectedCpuUsage), toint(anomalies)
| render anomalychart with(anomalycolumns=anomalies)
content.title: CPU Usage Actual vs Expected behavior (Past 7 days)

content.query:
let dt = 30m;
let horizon=3d;
InsightsMetrics
//| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_cpu_seconds_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName), Cpu = Tags.cpu, Mode = Tags.mode
| where Mode == "idle"
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(Mode, "/", Cpu, "/", HostName)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)), PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Rate, HostName
| summarize CpuUsage = 100 - (100 * avg(Rate)) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), HostName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| make-series CpuUsage=avg(CpuUsage) on TimeGenerated from {Timeframe:start} to now()+horizon step dt by 30m
| extend Predicted_CpuUSage = series_decompose_forecast(CpuUsage, toint(horizon/dt))
| render timechart
content.title: CPU Usage (Forecasting based on last 7 days data)
